fulltext:
Phạm Bá Thuần 
 Date of birth:  
07/05/1990.  
 Address:  
476/6 Lê Văn Sỹ F14 Q3 TPHCM. 
Education and training 
 University of Natural Sciences 
09/2008 - 10/2012 
Bachelor - Information Technology 
Experience 
Mulodo Vietnam 
10/2014 - Present 
PHP Developer 
 Develop website projects for the company. 
 Write unitest. 
 Assist leader to make a new page for the projects. 
Projects: 
1. http://tour.his-j.com/hawaii/ 
 Description: This site is about tours to Hawaii with 2 pages. Top page allows user 
to input something about tour. For example: depature date, tour days, hotel and 
air. After inputting those thing and pressing button, it will redirect to search page. 
In this page, it will show list of Hawaii tour. Left column is search criterias. When 
user check a box, it will filter right column follow this criteria. Search function was 
made by Ajax. 
 Team size: 6. 
 Duration: 6 months. 
 Technology used: FuelPHP, Ajax, API, Smarty template. 
 Responsibility: develop new version. 
2. http://tour.his-j.com/ct/search/02A_10/ 
 Description: Maintenance old sites. 
 Team size: 4 
 Duration: December 2014 - on going. 
Other demos: 
Besides, I learn more about Laravel and also share my knowledge about it for team 
members. I made a simple demo about adding, deleting and updating user using 
Laravel Framework. I applied some built-in classes and helper of it. For example: form 
validation, session, pagination, … I attached my sample demo in email. You can set up 
to run this site by reading 'readme.txt' in root folder of source. Here is the link to view my 
source: 
 https://github.com/firstlove75/laravel-demo 
Link demo: 
 http://admin-demo.byethost24.com/  (username: kenny, password: 12345) 
 http://pbtlove75.byethost33.com/zend_fashion/ (Demo with Zend Framework 2) 
Freelance 
PHP Developer  
03/2014 - 10/2014 
I used Wordpress to develop some websites in this time. It takes about 2 weeks to finish 
them. I worked as a main coder with 2 other members. Some project links: 
 http://www.remarket.se/

>2 years

Description: This site is about tours to Hawaii with 2 pages. Top page allows user to input something about tour. For example: depature date, tour days, hotel and air. After inputting those thing and pressing button, it will redirect to search page.
In this page, it will show list of Hawaii tour. Left column is search criterias. When user check a box, it will filter right column follow this criteria. Search function was made by Ajax. Team size: 6. Duration: 6 months.
